## Summary Statistics

Table 1. Summary statistics (minimum, mean, and maximum) of air temperature, water temperature at 1 and 5 meters, and salinity at 1 and 5 meters from October 2018 to October 2022.
| Variable                 | Min. | Mean | Max. |
|--------------------------|------|------|------|
| Air Temperature (C)      | -3.8 | 10.9 | 24.4 |
| 1m Water Temperature (C) |  3.4 | 10.3 | 18.2 |
| 5m Water Temperature (C) |  3.4 |  9.8 | 15.5 |
| 1m Salinity (ppt)        |  5.0 | 20.8 | 34.0 |
| 5m Salinity (ppt)        | 11.5 | 23.7 | 36.0 |
